channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.11
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.11

item.title: CVE-2023-5408|2024-09-16T13:35:06.906Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20openshift%20container%20platform%204.11
item.description: A privilege escalation flaw was found in the node restriction admission plugin of the kubernetes api server of OpenShift. A remote attacker who modifies the node role label could steer workloads from the control plane and etcd nodes onto different worker nodes and gain broader access to the cluster.

item.title: CVE-2023-6596|2024-08-20T16:22:18.030Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20openshift%20container%20platform%204.11
item.description: An incomplete fix was shipped for the Rapid Reset (CVE-2023-44487/CVE-2023-39325) vulnerability for an OpenShift Containers.
